Text:
Great stuff. Great idea for a television show. But I would like to see Dave Chappelle here. He's a really intelligent comedian as well...

And George Carlin, if he wasn't dead.
Chappelle is a joke. Funniest man alive but couldn't play the game.
I would have replaced Gervais with either Eddie Izzard or Patton Oswalt.
Gervais was the man who brought this all together!

Hilarious. Ricky Gervais is a genius, probably the second best comedian next to Bill Hicks. 
Thanks for this!
@SGAK You're mental. Ricky Gervais is one of the most brilliant comedians of our time. Pure godamn genius.
